title: Mystery Skins for positive players
body: Didn't Riot give out a free mystery skin to every player who was positive last year around this time? Can we do that again pls :D

replies.body: Yup! Riot did do this last year, but it's quite a possibility they might not distribute free skins again this year. The mentality is to essentially distribute gifts pretty much whenever the team decides to without necessarily setting a precedence of giving free content on a regular/scheduled basis. To be fair, positive players were recently given the handshake positive behavior icon! I would of course be very happy with getting a free skin, but would definitely understand if it didn't come around the New Years :P
What is this hand shake icon?
